name: Validate incorrect telephone number during profile update
scenarioId: classpath:features/UserAccountWorkFlow:Validate incorrect telephone number during profile update
methodName: Validate incorrect telephone number during profile update

testSteps.description: Given the user is logged in for edit profile

exception.message:
[User login failed, not redirected to account dashboard.] 
Expecting actual:
  "https://ecommerce-playground.lambdatest.io/?route=account/login"
to contain:
  "route=account/account"

stackTrace.methodName: the user is logged in for edit profile

testSteps.description: And the user navigates to the edit profile page
When the user updates their profile with first name "John", last name "Doe", email "chinth@example.com", and telephone "9876543210d"
Then an error message should be displayed "Invalid mobile number format."

title: Validate incorrect telephone number during profile update
